title: Any way to remove the "2017" in the Team Summ Icons?
body: I'd like to support a team (Longzhu) but at the same time i want border i can see properly without the team's Logo being extremely tiny in Loading Screens and friends list. I know it's unlikely that it'll be removed but will there ever be any Summ Icons i can get for Longzhu that don't have the Year Date on the bottom and just have their image as large as it can be?
